allow:
Bash(# Remove comment symbols from analyzer lines and other test code lines
sed -i '''' ''
# Remove comment from analyzer lines
s/^        # analyzer = /        analyzer = /g
# Remove comment from other lines with specific patterns
s/^        # \([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*.*=.*analyzer\)/        \1/g
s/^        # \(assert.*\)/        \1/g
s/^        # \([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]* = \)/        \1/g
s/^        # \(.*\..*(\)/        \1/g
s/^        # \(.*\[.*\]\)/        \1/g
s/^        # \(# .*\)/        \1/g
'' tests/unit/test_performance_analyzer.py)
